welcome_message_body: Welcome to Johor Bahru, where the rich cultural heritage and vibrant street life await you. Explore our bustling markets, delectable street food, and beautiful temples, and immerse yourself in the charm of this lively city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Me’nate Steak Hub
restaurants.description: Me’nate Steak Hub is a steakhouse located in Johor Bahru.

restaurants.name: 7 Spice Indian Cuisine
restaurants.description: 7 Spice Indian Cuisine is a indian restaurant located in Johor Bahru.
restaurants.address: G-01, Block 5, Danga Bay, Jalan Skudai, 80200 Johor Bahru, Johor

restaurants.name: Onn Kitchen
restaurants.description: Onn Kitchen is a café located in Johor Bahru.
restaurants.address: 29A Jalan Tarom (Kampung Bahru), 80100 Johor Bahru, Johor

restaurants.name: OliveMusiCafe
restaurants.description: OliveMusiCafe is a café located in Johor Bahru.

restaurants.name: W.W. Laksa House 水塘路辣沙
restaurants.description: W.W. Laksa House 水塘路辣沙 is a noodle restaurant located in Johor Bahru.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Seletar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Seletar Airport, mainly used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving most international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly budget airlines and regional carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and most luxurious terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly full-service airlines and featuring a butterfly garden and movie theater.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most technologically advanced terminal at Singapore Changi Airport, serving mainly budget airlines and featuring automated check-in and baggage systems.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds and longer usage.
